Description: THIS PROJECT SERVES A PUBLIC PURPOSE FOR THE RESIDENTS AND TRIBAL MEMBERS OF THE NAVAJO NATION, AND CITIZENS IN PRESERVING CULTURAL AND HISTORIC SITES AND ARTIFACTS, ALONG WITH RELATED CULTURAL RESOURCE MATERIAL REPORTS RELATED TO THE NAVAJO GALLUP WATER SUPPLY PROJECT. PRESERVATION OF THESE ITEMS PROVIDES THE PUBLIC WITH ACCESS TO HISTORICALLY SIGNIFICANT MATERIALS AND INFORMATION.NAVAJO NATION HERITAGE AND HISTORIC PRESERVATION DEPARTMENT WILL HIRE ONE FULL-TIME EQUIVALENT ARCHAEOLOGIST TO OVERSEE THE NATION'S PARTICIPATION IN THE CULTURAL RESOURCES'S ASPECT OF THE NAVAJO GALLUP WATER SUPPLY PROJECT.THE ARCHAELOGIST SHALL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE NAVAJO NATION POLICIES AND PROCEDURES SUCH AS THE NAVAJO NATION CULTURAL RESOURCES PROTECTION ACT, THE NAVAJO NATION POLICY FO THE DISPOSITION OF THE CULTURAL RESOURCE COLLECTIONS, THE NAVAJO NATION POLICY FOR THE PROTECTION OF JISHCHAAA': GRAVESITES: HUMAN REMAINS, AND FUNERARY ITEMS, AND OTHER APPLICABLE NAVAJO NATIO LAWS, POLICIES AND PROCEDURES ON THE NAVAJO GALLUP WATER SUPPLY PROJECT.REPORT REVIEW AND COMPLIANCECONSULTIATION WITH HATAALII ADVISORY COUNCIL, AND LOCAL COMMUNITY MEMBERSMEETING PARTICIPATIONINTERNAL NAVAJO NATION COORDINATIONMONITORING AND GENERAL DUTIES
DESIGN, CONSTRUCTION AND CONSTRUCTION OVERSIGHT FOR REACH 24.1, 25 AND 26 OF THE NAVAJO GALLUP WATER SUPPLY SYSTEM
DESIGN, CONSTRUCTION AND CONSTRUCTION OVERSIGHT FOR THE CITY OF GALLUP REGIONAL SYSTEM
